T02TD2796E:158a-0: @158a * // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2796E:158a-1: zla ba dung dang kun gangs ri ltar 'tsher ba //
T02TD2796E:158a-2: gzhon nu rab mdzes rin chen phreng bas rnam brgyan cing //
T02TD2796E:158a-3: mchog sbyin padmo 'od dpag med kyi g-yas g-yon phyag / spyi gtsug legs spras 'jig rten gsum mgon la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2796E:158a-4: rang lus dkyil 'khor pho brang 'dab stong gsal ba'i dbus //
T02TD2796E:158b-0: zla rgyas mdog lta'i sems nyid ngo bo ye shes hr'i: yig 'od @158b 'bar gyis //
T02TD2796E:158b-1: thig le rnam dag bde chen rang bzhin rlung sems bcud gang yin pa de //
T02TD2796E:158b-2: legs bsdus nas ni blo ldan dpa' rnams gnyug ma mchog la brtan gnas bya //
T02TD2796E:158b-3: de yi snying po las spros pa'i //
T02TD2796E:158b-4: 'od zer lcags kyu rnon po yis //
T02TD2796E:158b-5: rgyal pa'i pho brang po ta la'i //
T02TD2796E:158b-6: dbus nyid nas ni 'phags pa bskyod //
T02TD2796E:158b-7: shin tu dkar gsal ston gyi zla ba bye ba brgya yi 'od 'khrigs pa //
T02TD2796E:158b-8: bdag gi blo gros padmo rgyas pa'i kha dbye'i phyir ni bde gshegs 'bum gyi 'khor dang bcas //
T02TD2796E:158b-9: skad cig yud la rta bdun lam gang mgon po nyid mchod sprin rum 'khrigs pa'i dpung bkod pa //
T02TD2796E:158b-10: shes rab snang bas gsal bar bltas la mchod sprin rgya mtshos rab tu mchod //
T02TD2796E:158b-11: lha yi dbang phyug padmo'i rigs //
T02TD2796E:158b-13: phyogs bcu nas 'ongs phyogs bcu'i char //
T02TD2796E:158b-14: bzhugs bltas de dag mgon mchod bsam //
T02TD2796E:158b-15: tshangs dbyangs sna tshogs sku gsung thugs bstod mnyam med ngag gi skyon bral bas //
T02TD2796E:158b-16: yon tan kun brjod 'dod pa drag pos shin tu gsol btab gus byas la //
T02TD2796E:158b-17: dza:h'um bam ho:sa bde gshegs sa bon zla 'od 'bar ba la bstim bya //
T02TD2796E:158b-18: thim gyur rjes thogs thang cig de nyid bcu drug phyed phyed thig ler gyur //
T02TD2796E:158b-19: de yang yud kyis de bzhin du //
T02TD2796E:158b-20: spyan ras gzigs dbang gzhon nur gyur //
T02TD2796E:158b-21: de bzhin de yi thugs kar yang //
T02TD2796E:158b-22: rgyal ba'i snying po hr'i: bsam mo //
T02TD2796E:158b-23: de las zer bskyod dad pa'i zhags sra rdo rje'i thig gu bzhus pa yis //
T02TD2796E:158b-24: thub dbang thugs stabs skad cig de la thugs rje che mnga' thugs bskul gyur //
T02TD2796E:158b-25: dus gsum gshegs pa'i 'dren pas byin rlabs phun tshogs 'od zer dmar mdzes zhing //
T02TD2796E:158b-26: gyen du 'greng ltas smin mtshams mdzod spu'i sgo nas thogs med tal phyin phyung //
T02TD2796E:158b-27: zla zer 'di ni nyi ma yi //
T02TD2796E:158b-28: zer yin de yi lces reg pas //
T02TD2796E:158b-29: snying gi 'dab stong kha dbye zhing //
T02TD2796E:158b-30: phye ba'i dbus ni bskyab pa'i sku //
T02TD2796E:158b-32: zhag bcu phrag gsum nyid na de //
T02TD2796E:158b-33: blo ldan yid kyi mun sel zhing //
T02TD2796E:158b-34: dri ma ma lus rnam par 'khrud //
T02TD2796E:158b-35: rjes la drang srong nyid kyi sku //
T02TD2796E:158b-36: sdud byed rlung gi shugs can gyis //
T02TD2796E:158b-38: ting nge 'dzin yin 'khrul 'khor mchog / kharsa p'a na padma kha 'byed kyi man ngag rdzogs so//
